title: # 459 - Daniele Bolelli & ME
description:
Today I sit down with writer, professor, and podcaster Daniele Bolelli. We talk about our obsessions with history, General Custard, growing up in Italy, WWII Japan, royal families, and much more!

 

Check out Daniele’s podcast “History on Fire” wherever you get yours. 

 

This episode is brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com   

 

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon. Get 15% off your order at https://www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

 

This episode is also brought to you by SA. Buy one face shield and get 4 for free at http://www.safishing.com/bert
